awards.text: Nominated for 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.

fullplot: A documentary that weaves together the stories of Theodore, Franklin and Eleanor Roosevelt, three members of one of the most prominent and influential families in American politics.
plot: A documentary that weaves together the stories of Theodore, Franklin and Eleanor Roosevelt, three members of one of the most prominent and influential families in American politics.
title: The Roosevelts: An Intimate History
